column5: For those of you who build/repair boathouses and docks, what do you prefer to install for fixed "boat bumpers" -- tires or fire hose? And why? I know tires are far easier to acquire but they can leave black marks on the side of a boat. If you use fire hose, where do you get it (and what does it cost)?
I saw a couple on ebay one... I bet you could find one on there.
